sourcesContent:
import "./About.css" export default function About() { return (

Hello! I'm Gavin.

Welcome To My Portfolio.

I am a self taught developer and my goal is to land a job as a Front-End Web Developer. I have been working on web-development consistently since the end of 2021; I have also been coding across various other disciplines as a hobby for several years.

This portfolio showcases my website design progress, resume, skills, projects, contact information, and blog.

); }
